段: 人活ti7 這世間逐人有伊e5 趣味，有人愛扑獵，有人愛掠魚，有人愛看好看e5物，有人愛聽好聽e5聲音，有人愛鼻芳e5味，有人嘴愛食好食e5物。論食物種類真濟。直接會做咱小體 e5滋養--e5大概thang分做兩項：

Lang5 oah8 ti7 chit se3-kan tak8 lang5 u7 i e5 chhu3-bi7, u7 lang5 ai3 phah-lah8, u7 lang5 ai3 liah8 hi5, u7 lang5 ai3 khoaN3 ho2-khoaN3 e5 mih8, u7 lang5 ai3 thiaN ho2-thiaN e5 siaN-im, u7 lang5 ai3 phiN7 phang e5 bi7, u7 lang5 chhui3 ai3 chiah8 ho2-chiah8 e5 mih8. Lun7 chiah8-mih8 cheng2-lui7 chin choe7. Tit8-chiap oe7 choe3 lan2 siau2-the2 e5 chu-iong2--e5 tai7-khai3 thang hun-choe3 nng7 hang7:
1.有機性物質，就是有包含炭素e5物，親像：
1.U7 ki-seng3 but8-chit, chiu7-si7 u7 pau-ham5 Than3-sou3 e5 mih8, chhin-chhiuN7:
(a)卵白質，伊e5 成分是炭素，水素，酸素，窒素，伊e5 路用是會hou7 人e5身軀得著勢力，也是hou7 細胞加添新--e5。
(a) Nng7-peh8-chit, i e5 seng5-hun si7 Than3-sou3, Chui2-sou3, Sng-sou3, Chek-sou3, i e5 lou7-eng7 si7 oe7 hou7 lang5 e5 seng-khu tit tioh8 se3-lek8, ia7 si7 hou7 se3-pau ke-thiN sin--e5.
(b)含水炭素。
(b) Ham5-sui2 Than3-sou3.
(c)脂肪：in e5成分平平是炭素，水素，酸素，三項合成chiah-e5 ；(b) 佮 (c) boe7會hou7 細胞新生，總是會hou7 人加添勢力。
(c) Chi-hong5: in e5 seng5-hun piN5-piN5 si7 Than3-sou3, Chui2-sou3, Sng-sou3, saN hang7 hap8-chiaN5 chiah-e5; (b) kap (c) boe7-oe7 hou7 se3-pau sin siN, chong2-si7 oe7 hou7 lang5 ke-thiN se3-lek8.
2.無機性e5物質，就是無包含炭素e5物，親像：
2.Bu5 ki-seng3 e5 but8-chit, chiu7-si7 bo5 pau-ham5 Than3-sou3 e5 mih8, chhin-chhiuN7:
(a)鹽：伊e5 成分是Na2-tok-liu5-bou5 ( natrium ) 佮鹽素 。這項物卻boe7會hou7 人得著新勢力，抑是細胞新生，m7-ku2體成分e5結成，抑是體各機關e5機能上有大e5關係，親像人若食全然無鹽分e5物，是比攏無食物iau2較快死；an2-ni thang知身軀若無鹽是boe7用得。

(a) Iam5: i e5 seng5-hun si7 Na2-tok-liu5-bou5 (natrium) kap Iam5-sou3. Chit hang7 mih8 khiok boe7-oe7 hou7 lang5 tit tioh8 sin se3-lek8, a2 si7 se3-pau sin siN, m7-ku2 The2-seng5-hun e5 kiat-chiaN5, a2 si7 the2 kok ki-koan e5 Ki-leng5 siong7 u7 toa7 e5 koan-he7, chhin-chhiuN7 lang5 na7 chiah8 choan5-jian5 bo5 Iam5-hun e5 mih8, si7 pi2 long2 bo5 chiah8 mih8 iau2 khah khoai3 si2; an2-ni thang chai seng-khu na7 bo5 Iam5 si7 boe7 eng7-tit.

(b)水：伊e5 成分是水素佮酸素。這項物ti7 咱e5 身軀內會幫贊咱e5 消化，血液e5內面也有一定e5水分；若傷少，就血變較厚，致到hou7 咱知嘴礁。咱e5 身軀內面不時著有約略一升e5水。其他iau2有直接boe7會做咱e5滋養，親像茶、咖啡、胡椒、番薑、薑，薰、酒，chiah-e5 物有真濟人愛--伊。今我將其中酒佮生理的作用，就是佮咱人e5健康e5關係大略講幾句。酒精泡hou7伊較薄就是酒。酒極厚--e5就是酒精。平平酒也有厚薄e5增差。燒酒100分e5中間50分是酒精。日本清酒100分15分e5酒精。葡萄酒100分9分e5酒精，麥酒 ( Beer ) 100分4分e5酒精。

(b) Chui2: i e5 seng5-hun si7 Chui2-sou3 kap Sng-sou3. Chit hang7 mih8 ti7 lan2 e5 seng-khu-lai7 oe7 pang-chan7 lan2 e5 siau-hoa3, Huih-ek8 e5 lai7-bin7 ia7 u7 it-teng7 e5 chui2-hun; na7 siuN chio2, chiu7 huih piN3 khah kau7, ti3-kau3 hou7 lan2 chai chhui3-ta. Lan2 e5 seng-khu lai7-bin7 put-si5 tioh8 u7 iok-liok8 chit8 chin e5 chui2. Ki5-thaN iau2 u7 tit8-chiap boe7-oe7 choe3 lan2 e5 chu-iong2, chhin-chhiuN7 Te5, Ka-pi, Hou5-chio, Hoan-kiuN, KiuN, Hun, Chiu2, chiah-e5 mih8 u7 chin choe7 lang5 ai3 i. TaN goa2 chiong ki5-tiong Chiu2 kap Seng-li2-tek chok-iong7, chiu7-si7 kap lan2 lang5 e5 kian7-khong e5 koan-he7 tai7-liok8 kong2 kui2 ku3. Chiu2-cheng phau3 hou7 i khah poh8 chiu7-si7 chiu2. Chiu2 kek8 kau7--e5 chiu7-si7 chiu2-cheng. PiN5-piN5 chiu2 ia7 u7 kau7-poh8 e5 cheng-chha. Sio-chiu2 100 hun e5 tiong-kan 50 hun si7 chiu2-cheng. Jit8-pun2 Chheng-chiu2 100 hun 15 hun e5 chiu2-cheng. Phu5-to5-chiu2 100 hun 9 hun e5 chiu2-cheng, Beh8-chiu2 (Beer) 100 hun 4 hun e5 chiu2-cheng.

酒是古早人所bat興奮劑刺激物e5一項。伊e5 成分照化學的來講，是炭素，酸素，水素，這3項化學來成，分量濟少e5增差，會變做濟濟款e5酒精。譬喻親像炭素1，水素4，酸素1，合成做Methyl alcohol 。炭素2，水素6，酸素1，合成做Ethyl alcohol 。親像an2-ni有濟濟款e5酒精ti7--teh。一般酒精就是用糖分佮酵來做，親像咱台灣現時製糖會社利用糖蜜teh做酒精。古早人是用果子汁，較濟是用葡萄汁hou7 伊醱酵來做；台灣舊慣是用酒飯chhiau 酵來做，酒會生出一種e5芳味，hou7 lim e5人會受刺激，大心喟，也較傷重就boe7記得逐項。

Chiu2 si7 kou2-cha2 lang5 sou2 bat heng-hun3-che chhi3-kek-mih8 e5 chit8 hang7. I e5 seng5-hun chiau3 hoa3-hak8-tek lai5 kong2, si7 Than3-sou3, Sng-sou3, Chui2-sou3, chit 3 hang7 hoa3-hak8 lai5 chiaN5, hun-liong7 choe7-chio2 e5 cheng-chha, oe7 piN3-choe3 choe7-choe7 khoan2 e5 chiu2-cheng. Phi3-ju7 chhin-chhiuN7 Than3-sou3 1, Chui2-sou3 4, Sng-sou3 1, hap8-chiaN5 choe3 Methyl alcohol. Than3-sou3 2, Chui2-sou3 6, Sng-sou3 1, hap8-chiaN5 choe3 Ethyl alcohol. Chhin-chhiuN7 an2-ni u7 choe7-choe7 khoan2 e5 chiu2-cheng ti7--teh. It-poaN chiu2-cheng chiu7-si7 eng7 thng5-hun kap kaN3 lai5 choe3, chhin-chhiuN7 lan2 Tai5-oan5 hian7-si5 che3-thng5 hoe7-sia7 li7-iong7 thng5-bit8 teh choe3 chiu2-cheng. Kou2-cha2 lang5 si7 eng7 ke2-chi2-chiap, khah choe7 si7 eng7 phu5-to5-chiap hou7 i hoat-kaN3 lai5 choe3; Tai5-oan5 ku7-koan3 si7 eng7 chiu2-png7 chhiau kaN3 lai5 choe3, chiu2 oe7 siN chhut chit8 chiong2 e5 phang-bi7, hou7 lim e5 lang5 oe7 siu7 chhi3-kek, toa7-sim-khui3, ia7 khah siong-tiong7 chiu7 boe7 ki3-tit tak8-hang7.
Lim酒e5人那濟，酒e5消費量也那濟；製酒後來續漸漸變做一種e5特別生理，到近代續成做一個大工業；逐國工科大學攏有做酒科teh研究製酒以及別項。論酒e5成e5因端，ti7 40外年前Louis Pasteur 才知酒就是化學的佮生理的e5作用來成--e5。

Lim-chiu2 e5 lang5 na2 choe7, chiu2 e5 siau-hui3-liong7 ia7 na2 choe7; che3-chiu2 au7-lai5 soa3 chiam7-chiam7 piN3-choe3 chit8 chiong2 e5 tek8-piat8 seng-li2, kau3 kun7-tai7 soa3 chiaN5-choe3 chit8 e5 toa7 kang-giap8; tak8 kok kang-kho Tai7-hak8 long2 u7 choe3 chiu2-kho teh gian2-kiu3 che3-chiu2 i2-kip8 pat8-hang7. Lun7 chiu2 e5 chiaN5 e5 in-toaN, ti7 40 goa7 ni5-cheng5 Louis Pasteur chiah chai chiu2 chiu7-si7 Hoa3-hak8-tek kap Seng-li2-tek e5 chok-iong7 lai5 chiaN5--e5.

酒入動物體到底有甚物作用，是到最近才明白。人若用少koh薄koh好，化學的純萃e5酒會幫贊人e5消化；總是che是極oh，因為人受酒刺激，那久著那強，量也著那濟，才會感覺，所以lim酒較常是有害無益，oh得撙節。Lim酒e5習慣tui3早流傳到今真久，濟濟人是teh倚靠製酒賣酒來teh生活。美國 ( 歐戰以前 ) 全國約有兩百萬teh干涉製酒e5事業。An2-ni thang知酒e5根穿入社會已經真深，所以濟濟知影e5人，雖然知酒e5害毒真大，iau2-ku2 ai3 beh除棄真oh--得。

Chiu2 jip8 Tong7-but8-the2 tau3-ti2 u7 sim2-mih8 chok-iong7, si7 kau3 choe3-kun7 chiah beng5-pek8. Lang5 na7 eng7 chio2 koh poh8 koh ho2, hoa3-hak8-tek sun5-chui7 e5 chiu2 oe7 pang-chan7 lang5 e5 siau-hoa3; chong2-si7 che si7 kek8 oh, in-ui7 lang5 siu7 chiu2 chhi3-kek, na2 ku2 tioh8 na2 kiong5, liong7 ia7 tioh8 na2 choe7, chiah oe7 kam2-kak, sou2-i2 lim-chiu2 khah siong5 si7 u7 hai7 bo5 ek, oh-tit chun2-chat. Lim-chiu2 e5 sip8-koan3 tui3 cha2 liu5-thoan5 kau3 taN chin ku2, choe7-choe7 lang5 si7 teh oa2-kho3 che3 chiu2 boe7 chiu2 lai5 teh seng-oah8. Bi2-kok (Au-chian3 i2-cheng5) choan5-kok iok u7 nng7-pah ban7 teh kan-siap8 che3-chiu2 e5 su7-giap8. An2-ni thang chai chiu2 e5 kun chhng jip8 sia7-hoe7 i2-keng chin chhim, sou2-i2 choe7-choe7 chai-iaN2 e5 lang5, sui-jian5 chai chiu2 e5 hai7-tok8 chin toa7, iau2-ku2 ai3 beh tu5-khi3 chin oh--tit.

論酒thang lim抑m7-thang e5問題，tui3真早就有teh議論；有人講酒是百項藥e5頭，有人講酒是狂水，會hou7 人失知覺。其實有影，若beh舉伊e5 實例是真濟，講boe7了，也研究到清楚，酒m7 是會做藥--得。有真濟有路用e5青年為著愛lim酒致到悽慘落魄，甚至失落性命也有；但是也有老人in對少年時代就有teh lim酒，in 也勇健，食到老老。An2-ni咱若kan-ta用普通e5觀察，實在oh得知酒是有利益抑是損害，所以論酒thang lim抑 m7-thang，酒是毒mah？若是毒，是佗一種e5毒，也用量著偌濟才是毒？Koh一項：酒實在會利益人mah？Tui3 chiah-e5 問題咱boe7會隨便chhin3-chhai2 抵抵an3-chaiN2-iuN7 來應。

Lun7 chiu2 thang lim a2 m7-thang e5 bun7-te5, tui3 chin cha2 chiu7 u7 teh gi7-lun7; u7 lang5 kong2 chiu2 si7 pah-hang7 ioh8 e5 thau5, u7 lang5 kong2 chiu2 si7 kong5-chui2, oe7 hou7 lang5 sit ti-kak. Ki5-sit8 u7-iaN2, na7 beh ku2 i e5 sit8-le7 si7 chin choe7, kong2 boe7 liau2, ia7 gian2-kiu3 kau3 chheng-chho2, chiu2 m7 si7 oe7 choe3 ioh8--tit. U7 chin choe7 u7 lou7-eng7 e5 chheng-lian5 ui7 tioh8 ai3 lim-chiu2 ti3-kau3 chhi-chham2 lok8-phek, sim7-chi3 sit-loh8 siN3-mia7 ia7 u7; na7 si7 ia7 u7 lau7-lang5 in tui3 siau3-lian5 si5-tai7 chiu7 u7 teh lim-chiu2, in ia7 iong2-kiaN7, chiah8 kau3 lau7-lau7. An2-ni lan2 na7 kan-ta eng7 phou2-thong e5 koan-chhat, sit8-chai7 oh-tit chai chiu2 si7 u7 li7-ek a2 si7 sun2-hai7, sou2-i2 lun7 chiu2 thang lim a2 m7-thang, chiu2 si7 tok8 mah? Na7 si7 tok8, si7 to2 chit8 chiong2 e5 tok8, ia7 eng7-liong7 tioh8 joa7-choe7 chiah si7 tok8? Koh chit8 hang7: chiu2 sit8-chai7 oe7 li7-ek lang5 mah? Tui3 chiah-e5 bun7-toe5 lan2 boe7-oe7 sui5-pian7 chhin3-chhai2 tu2-tu2 an3-chaiN2-iuN7 lai5 in3.
照日常生活咱著想兩款：
Chiau3 jit8-siong5 seng-oah8 lan2 tioh8 siuN7 nng7 khoan2:
1.M7-thang用個人特別e5經驗來證明酒e5利益抑是害。咱 m7-thang想講，親像外國有一個有名e5詩人號做 Goethe ； 伊一世人lim有5000矸e5酒。抑是親像中國早有一個出名e5詩人李太白，伊也是愛酒家。咱 m7-thang想講，in gau5做詩，思想深，是因為lim酒e5結果。

1.M7-thang eng7 ko3-jin5 tek8-piat8 e5 keng-giam7 lai5 cheng3-beng5 chiu2 e5 li7-ek a2 si7 hai7. Lan2 m7-thang siuN7 kong2, chhin-chhiuN7 goa7-kok u7 chit8 e5 iu2-beng5 e5 si-jin5 ho7-choe3 Goethe; i chit8-si3-lang5 lim u7 5000 kan e5 chiu2. A2 si7 chhin-chhiuN7 Tiong-kok cha2 u7 chit8 e5 chhut-mia5 e5 si-jin5 Li2 Thai3-pek8, i ia7 si7 ai3-chiu2-ka. Lan2 m7-thang siuN7 kong2, in gau5 choe3 si, su-siong2 chhim, si7 in-ui7 lim-chiu2 e5 kiat-ko2.
2.著將濟濟人e5經驗來討論。第一hou7 咱會信得e5就是保險會社。對chiah-e5 Lim酒家佮禁酒家e5記錄，照in e5記錄平均：

2.Tioh8 chiong choe7-choe7 lang5 e5 keng-giam7 lai5 tho2-lun7. Te7-it hou7 lan2 oe7 sin3-tit e5 chiu7-si7 po2-hiam2 hoe7-sia7. Tui3 chiah-e5 Lim-chiu2-ka kap Kim3-chiu2-ka e5 ki3-liok8, chiau3 in e5 ki3-liok8 peng5-kun:
(A)Lim酒家比禁酒家一般較短命。
(A) Lim-chiu2-ka pi2 Kim3-chiu2-ka it-poaN khah toe2-mia7.
Tui3 15-20歲 Lim酒家死2人，
Tui3 15-20 he3 Lim-chiu2-ka si2 2 lang5,
禁酒家死1人。
Kim3-chiu2-ka si2 1 lang5.
Tui3 20-30歲 Lim酒家死3人，
Tui3 20-30 he3 Lim-chiu2-ka si2 3 lang5,
禁酒家死1人。
Kim3-chiu2-ka si2 1 lang5.
Tui3 30歲以上Lim酒家死4人，
Tui3 30 he3 i2-siong7 Lim-chiu2-ka si2 4 lang5,
禁酒家死1人。
Kim3-chiu2-ka si2 1 lang5.
An2-ni thang知無論老幼平均Lim酒家死較濟人，就是較快死，較短命。
An2-ni thang chai bo5-lun7 lo2-iu3 peng5-kun Lim-chiu2-ka si2 khah choe7 lang5, chiu7-si7 khah khoai3 si2, khah toe2-mia7.
(B)若著傳染病e5 時，Lim酒家比禁酒家死較濟。
(B) Na7 tioh8 Thoan5-jiam2-piN7 e5 si5, Lim-chiu2-ka pi2 Kim3-chiu2-ka si2 khah choe7.
Koh一款hou7咱會信憑得e5記錄，就是病院對患者e5記錄。
Koh chit8 khoan2 hou7 lan2 oe7 sin3-pin5-tit e5 ki3-liok8, chiu7-si7 piN7-iN7 tui3 hoan7-chia2 e5 ki3-liok8.
(1)著傳染病e5 時禁酒家比Lim酒家較有活e5向望，照英國（Cholera）「Ko-le-lah」(落吐瀉)，就是傳染病院e5統計。Lim酒家100人死91人，禁酒家100人死19人。

(1) Tioh8 Thoan5-jiam2-piN7 e5 si5 Kim3-chiu2-ka pi2 Lim-chiu2-ka khah u7 oah8 e5 ng3-bang7, chiau3 Eng-kok (Cholera) “Ko-le-lah” (Lau3-thou3-sia3), chiu7-si7 Thoan5-jiam2 PiN7-iN7 e5 thong2-ke3. Lim-chiu2-ka 100 lang5 si2 91 lang5, Kim3-chiu2-ka 100 lang5 si2 19 lang5.
(2)Thai5割 ( 手術 ) e5 時禁酒家比Lim酒家較快好。Koh一款就是鐵道事故統計Lim酒家比禁酒家較捷抵著危險，也較會害人抵著危險。試想行車e5人若酒醉，應該著停車e5所在，m7 停車；抑是驛長若酒醉，信號亂放，實在真危險。

(2) Thai5-koah (chhiu2-sut8) e5 si5 Kim3-chiu2-ka pi2 Lim-chiu2-ka khah khoai3 ho2. Koh chit8 khoan2 chiu7-si7 Thih-to7 su7-kou3 thong2-ke3 Lim-chiu2-ka pi2 Kim3-chiu2-ka khah chiap8 tu2 tioh8 gui5-hiam2, ia7 khah oe7 hai7 lang5 tu2 tioh8 gui5-hiam2. Chhi3-siuN7 kiaN5-chhia e5 lang5 na7 chiu2-chui3, eng-kai tioh8 theng5-chhia e5 sou2-chai7, m7 theng5-chhia; a2 si7 iah8-tiuN2 na7 chiu2-chui3, sin3-ho7 loan7-pang3, sit8-chai7 chin gui5-hiam2.
今論酒精佮消化有甚物關係，也lim淡薄酒會刺激胃，較gau5 流胃液；總是酒精分是阻擋胃液e5消化。M7-ku2人若lim淡薄酒，一時會較gau5食，是因為胃液流真濟e5緣故；若酒精傷濟入消化器，會燒著粘膜細胞，就是胃壁，也hou7 hiah-e5 teh出消化液e5機關較無活動。An2-ni會hou7人致到胃lam2，抑是別款e5消化不良。

TaN lun7 chiu2-cheng kap siau-hoa3 u7 sim2-mih8 koan-he7, ia7 lim tam7-poh8 chiu2 oe7 chhi3-kek ui7, khah gau5 lau5 ui7-ek8; chong2-si7 chiu2-cheng-hun si7 chou2-tong3 ui7-ek8 e5 siau-hoa3. M7-ku2 lang5 na7 lim tam7-poh8 chiu2, chit8-si5 oe7 khah gau5 chiah8, si7 in-ui7 ui7-ek8 lau5 chin choe7 e5 ian5-kou3; na7 chiu2-cheng siuN choe7 jip8 siau-hoa3-khi3, oe7 sio tioh8 liam5-mouh8 soe3-pau, chiu7-si7 ui7-piah, ia7 hou7 hiah-e5 teh chhut siau-hoa3-ek8 e5 ki-koan khah bo5 oah8-tang7. An2-ni oe7 hou7 lang5 ti3-kau3 ui7 lam2, a2 si7 pat8-khoan2 e5 siau-hoa3 put-liong5.
